publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2478 Angus MacKay: Standards in Public Life Code of Conduct: Member's Model Code (SE/2001/51)—That the Local Government Committee, in consideration of Standards in Public Life Code of Conduct: Member’s Model Code (SE/2001/51), recommends that the code be approved. Supported by: Peter Peacock*

S1M-2478 Angus MacKay: Standards in Public Life Code of Conduct: Member's Model Code (SE/2001/51)—That the Local Government Committee in consideration of Standards in Public Life Code of Conduct: Member’s Model Code (SE/2001/51), recommends that the code be approved. Supported by: Peter Peacock
